welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Adrogue, Argentina! Get ready to experience the charm and beauty of our city known for its historic buildings, delicious cuisine, and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Adrogue has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main international terminal at Ezeiza Ministro Pistarini Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights at Ezeiza Ministro Pistarini Airport.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights within Argentina.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights to neighboring countries.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the WiFi network for free for up to 1 hour.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at La Plata Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at La Plata Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
